name: ReMoDDeD
savepath: Another update for you guys that focuses on improving oskills, icons, and a bit of monster tuning. As always, a healthy dose of bug fixes were tossed into the mix; I appreciate your feedback. Wiki development is going well, and should hopefully be growing into a powerful tool in it's own right in due time. Thank you to those who support the projects and have been patient during development - you guys are rockstars!

D2RLaunch has been re-built from the ground up to be more stable, more efficient and have improved functionality. It will look and behave very similarly to the old D2RLaunch; just now with a more dynamic UI and
implementation. Please give special Thanks to @Alias and all his effort in spearheading this re-vamp. More details of the new and improved D2RLaunch can be found on our discord.
